page.title: 11Cople Lower School
page.content:
This 5-9 lower school was built in 1868.There are two classes for the 53 children. The school they will be going to next is Abbey Middle School at Elstow. The school is in good condition considering its age, but the inside needs painting.
They have a swimming pool for learners,a library and a computer but they have no playing field. They use the village field in Grange Lane.The school has close ties with the playgroup,and over 60's club.
The pre-school playgroup visits for the concerts held every year.The vicar takes assembly every other Tuesday. Most of the children live in Cople, (1lives in Cardington, 2 in Northill and 2 in Great Barford).
